Better coordination of response team based on attack nature/cyber event.
Early preventive action on a particular repetitive cyber-attack trend.
x_snc_hack4good_0_hack4good_proposal.problem_statement: In the dynamic environment, cyber threats are persistent. This solution is to provide a shared channel to inform on cyber incident and post actions review notes taken contributed by a community.
x_snc_hack4good_0_hack4good_proposal.solution_proposal:
How do you envision the ideal solution to this  problem?

 

Which ServiceNow products or capabilities would be used?

AI text interpretation to link scenario to exploit use cases and recommended action.
Alert keen parties on spike of similar cyber incident or targeted cyber attack in the region.
Knowledge article to collect cyber events and review notes.
MITRE repository on recommended best cybersecurity practice and response action to the particular event.
Virtual Agent to understand the use case better and advise the best course of preventive/remediative action.

 

Are there any technical dependencies for the proposed solution?

Link/Ingest to cyber authority software/repo for recommended practice
Having onmi-channel for feedback and event declaration/alert
Some form of user KYC background checker tool to prevent spams

 

What challenges would you foresee in implementing this idea?

Solutions are accurate from authority source and not to make the environment more vulnerable.
Cyber event is fed honestly and timely to the shared repo.
Someone to gather and curate the content to be consistent and action based.
